title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 154 - Private Passenger Motor Vehicle Insurance Multi-tier Programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 154 - Private Passenger Motor Vehicle Insurance Multi-tier Programs

State Regulations
§ 154.0 - Introduction and purpose
§ 154.1 - General rules governing multi-tier programs
§ 154.2 - Multi-tier program underwriting rules
§ 154.3 - Application of section 3425 of the insurance law
§ 154.4 - Disclosure requirements
§ 154.5 - Monitoring requirements
§ 154.6 - Use of Education Level Attained and/or Occupational Status in Multi-Tier Programs

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 154

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 2349, Art. 23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
